author: Reuters Editorial
title: German minister: Want Opel plants here to be safe in long-term
text:
BERLIN (Reuters) - German Economy Minister Peter Altmaier said on Wednesday that the German government wanted Opel plants in Germany to be shored up for the future as France’s PSA Group ( PEUP.PA ), which last year bought Opel, seeks to make savings.
The logo of Opel is seen at their plant in Eisenach, Germany April 24, 2018. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach “The German government has an interest in Opel sites in Germany being secured for the long-term,” Altmaier said. “At the moment we’re discussing how the Eisenach plant in particular can be stabilized and secured.”
Reporting by Michelle Martin and Paul Carrel
